bibl.title: An Overlooked Papyrus of Isaios. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Paper presented at the First Eric Turner Memorial Colloquium at the Institute of Classical Studies in June 2004. - P. Oxy. XXXI, 2538 was tentatively assigned to the orator Lysias. This paper argues for attribution to Isaios on grounds of argument and style.
CAREY Chris, An Overlooked Papyrus of Isaios. Avec résumé en anglais.
